/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in hues of beige and brown, are adorned with balconies and awnings, adding character to the cityscape. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand bare against the winter sky, their branches reaching out like skeletal fingers. The sky itself is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the textures and colors of the city.
